Tom: You're working for the wrong man.
- You are working for the wrong man. - Oh, on the contrary..
You're working for the wrong man.
And you've got something that the other guys don't have.
You exudes something. You draw people in.
All reporters love you. Even the ones that hates you.
Cos, you play them all like they're pieces on chess-board.
We both know, How hard it is.
From the outside, you make it look easy.
People are scared of you, cos they don't understand how you do it.
And that is the most valuable thing in this business.
By making them mistake their fear, for love.
